item.description:
This will probably be the last ice skating event I'll schedule for the season. Most ice skating rinks are managed by the state and have closed for the season. Simoni ice skating rink in Cambridge is privately managed and is open for a couple more weeks.  It's $5.00 to skate, and if you don't have your own skates there is a $4.00 rental fee.

We're going to meet at 2:00 p.m. in outside in front of the rink.  If people are interested, we can gather afterwards at the East Side Bar & Grille.  Closest T stop is Lechmere on the green line at First Street, so about a 6 block walk. There are also buses that travel down this street. If you are driving, the rink has a parking lot. It's also located next to Twin City Plaza on McGrath/O'Brien Highway.

As always, if your plans change, please update your RSVP. If you have any questions, let me know.
item.how_to_find_us: Outside in front of the rink
item.why: All of the rinks are closing for the season.
item.name: One More Ice Skate
